text: Bruno Munari (October 24, 1907 in Milan â€“ September 30, 1998 in Milan) was an Italian artist, designer, and inventor. He contributed fundamentals to many fields of visual arts (painting, sculpture, movie, industrial design, graphic design) in modernism, futurism, and concrete art, and in non visual arts (literature, poetry) with his research on games, didactic method, movement, tactile learning, kinesthetic learning, and creativity. == Other websites == * http://www.munart.org/index.php?p2=0 * Bruno Munari's books for Corraini Edizioni Category:1907 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Italian designers Category:Artists from Milan
title: Bruno Munari
